text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's finally time for tryouts to begin. It<n>looks like Smart
Falcon will be<n>participating in the 1,600-meter turf<n>race.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Sigh... Wait, no. I have to bepositive and smile brightly—like a trueUmadol!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But still... What if I fail aga—no! I can't<n>let myself think like
that! I've been<n>training super hard! I'm sure I'll be<n>fine
this time!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She still looks unsure of herself as<n>she starts out the gate.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Yaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although she runs as fast as she can,<n>the trainers watching
her remain<n>unimpressed.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Smart Falcon's here again, huh? I get<n>that she's trying her
best, but there's<n>something missing from her running...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just like the other trainer says, Smart<n>Falcon seems to be
struggling on the<n>track.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Out of the race's twelve contestants,<n>Smart Falcon finishes
in tenth place.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Although her placement is less than<n>ideal, the power in her
running form<n>drew my attention. It's not that she's<n>
missing something from her running,<n>but rather...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, there you are! Aaah, I probably<n>looked super lame back
there... Sorry<n>about that.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
But hey, I heard that people like<n>cheering on the underdog!
You know,<n>since it's nice to see them grow!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm beginning to suspect that it isn't<n>a matter of growth, but
compatibility.<n>Given her style of running, a dirt<n>course
might suit her better...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: ...I'm no good, huh?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
To tell you the truth, it wasn't just<n>today. I messed up all
my other<n>tryouts too. I don't have anything to<n>show for
myself, so nobody wants to<n>scout me...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I know I don't have a lot going for<n>me, but still... I want to
become the<n>best Umadol ever!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
It's my dream to win races and<n>perform winning concerts
on the<n>biggest stages! But I can't do that on<n>my own...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: That's why... I need you! I need your<n>help to reach my goal!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Please, help me! Even a single<n>training session would mean
the world<n>to me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her words are earnest, and I can see<n>that she wants
nothing more than to<n>achieve her dreams. Naturally, as a<n>
trainer, I want to lend her a hand.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huh? Really?! Like, for real?!Phew... I'm so glad I asked you!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I can't wait to start training with you!<n>Bring it on! Whatever it
is, I'll do it. No<n>holding back, okay?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
For now, I decide to set aside the<n>question of whether or not
I'll become<n>Smart Falcon's trainer and focus on<n>preparing
her for the next round of<n>tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Nrgh! Nnnngh! Hrnng! ☆

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Wow, look at her doing those legcurls! Those weights look superheavy! Her smile's kinda creepingme out though...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Okay! I'm ready to run! ☆<n>Hiyayayayaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't see any issues with her<n>weight lifting or incline
running. If<n>anything, she seems stronger than<n>the average
runner. Yet...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... huff... H-how's mytime?!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Siiigh... Oof... I'm not getting anybetter...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Whenever she races on a turf course,<n>her results are
always lackluster. My<n>hunch seems to be right that it's a<n>
compatibility issue.

text_block_list.name: Group of Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ahhhh! Suzuka! Over here!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Um... Excuse me, but I have to train<n>for tomorrow's race.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Surrounded by the cheers of excited<n>Umamusume, Silence
Suzuka looks<n>somewhat troubled. Already having<n>made
her debut, she's been putting<n>on an impressive display
across many<n>races.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hey, you guys! ☆ I get that you all are<n>huge fans of hers, but
you gotta give<n>her some space!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Suzuka's getting ready to train so<n>she can shine during her
next race!<n>True fans should be patient and wait<n>to watch
her then, don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Group of Umamusume
text_block_list.text: She's right... Sorry for bothering you!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Thank you, Falcon... I wasn't sure<n>what to do there...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Just call me Falco! ☆ If you're ever in<n>that kinda situation
again, just make<n>yourself clear! They'll listen, I<n>promise!
♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But I'm sure you know that better<n>than I do...

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Anyway, you've got practice, right?<n>Good luck! ☆ I'll be
cheering for you<n>too! ♪

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: So... could you explain why we're<n>here at the dirt course?!
choice_data_list: I just want to time your running here as well.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I believe a course that requires<n>power—in other words, a dirt<n>
course—might better suit Smart<n>Falcon. I tell her how I'd like
to<n>confirm my suspicions.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
Hrmmm... Got it! But... don't expect<n>too much from me,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hiyayayayaya!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I was right. Her time on the dirtcourse is leaps and bounds better.She's met—no, exceeded myexpectations.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Pant... pant... pant...
choice_data_list: That was your best time yet!
That was your best time yet!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Everything's falling into place. I now<n>know for certain that
running on a dirt<n>course, which requires more strength<n>
than agility, brings out her true<n>potential.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But with that, a new question arises.<n>Why haven't her
teachers picked up<n>on something as elementary as this<n>
and told her about it?
choice_data_list: You should be running in dirt races.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: Hrk... I thought you'd say that.

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text: But... no! I can't! I can't run on dirt!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
I have to win on turf or this is all<n>pointless! I don't have any
other<n>choice!

text_block_list.name: Smart Falcon
text_block_list.text:
A-anyway, I have dance practice<n>now, so let's call it here!
Thank you<n>for today!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As I watch Smart Falcon dash across<n>the dirt at an
incredible speed, I begin<n>to wonder why she insists on
running<n>in turf races. Her reasoning could be<n>a hint to
helping her grow.
